summary: D’ZETA Digital Ecosystem web/app for a café/space: published v2 and now building a branded homepage plus new customer/admin features (reviews, zonal ordering, ESG impact tracking, storytelling, booking, and real-time queue/order status).
architectural_notes: Homepage visual/theme direction: Deep Forest Green + Terracotta + White Smoke; vintage-modern style; serif headlines + sans-serif body; mobile-readable.
architecturalNotesToRemove([])?? no must be array strings. We'll fill proper below.
known_issues: Build/deploy pipeline hit internal configuration error ('A configuration error has occurred. Please notify the Caffeine team.') causing failed build attempt.

existing_features.title: Create a new dedicated Homepage at route '/' that implements the provided homepage copywriting as five sections in this order: (1) Hero section with headline, sub-headline, and two CTA buttons, (2) “The Digital Edge” value proposition grid with three feature blurbs, (3) “The Social & Eco Impact” section with body text and a live counter area, (4) “Explore Our Space (370 m²)” section listing the four zones with short descriptions, (5) a professional footer block matching the provided footer copy.

Wire the homepage CTAs to existing routes: the primary CTA should navigate to the Menu/ordering experience, and the secondary CTA should navigate to an exploration experience (Mini Museum and/or booking) using the existing TanStack Router routes.

Apply the requested “Vintage Modern” look to the homepage (and only homepage if global theme changes are risky), using earth-tone styling aligned to the provided palette guidance: Deep Forest Green, Terracotta, and White Smoke; and use a serif headline + sans-serif body pairing consistent with the current Tailwind font configuration.

Update routing and navigation behaviors to reflect that '/' is now the Homepage: change the index route component to the new Homepage, update BottomNav active-state logic so it no longer treats '/' as the Museum route, and update any “Back to Home” navigation that currently points to '/museum' to instead point to '/'.

Implement the Homepage “Live Counter” area using existing available metrics queries/components where possible, with graceful fallbacks if metrics are unavailable (e.g., show placeholders or ‘—’ rather than breaking layout). Counters must include the three items from the draft: ‘520+ Kilogram Limbah Terolah’, ‘5 Kecamatan Mitra Lokal’, and ‘100% Listrik Terjamin (Backup System)’.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a Reviews section in the menu for both user and admin: users can view and write reviews; admin can manage/review them.
Implement Zonal Ordering & Table Mapping (prompt users where they are seated; map zones/tables to help service).
Implement 'The Heart' Impact Tracker / ESG Counter that shows impact per order (e.g., organic fertilizer grams) and a live counter section.
Add Gastronomy Digital Storytelling: 'Story' button per menu item showing origin/history and related photos/content (links to Mini Museum content).
Add Event & Space Booking module with a 'Booking Space' menu and availability calendar for events.
Add Real-time Order Status & Queue Estimator (progress states like received → brewing → on the way).
Build homepage using the provided SSS-tier copywriting sections (Hero, Digital Edge, Impact, Explore Space, Footer) with vintage-modern earth-tone theme and serif/sans font pairing.
